data.title: Amazon asks FCC to give swift approval to Project Kuiper satellite network despite SpaceX opposition
data.text: Amazon fired its latest volley today in a back-and-forth debate over whether the company can proceed in an expedited fashion with its 3,236-satellite Project Kuiper mega-constellation for broadband internet access.

data.title: Mackenzie Bezos Gets Rid  Of About $370M Of Her Amazon Shares
data.text: Mackenzie Bezos, the former wife of Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos, has unloaded a little over 200,000 of her shares in the company.

data.title: Buy Sluggish Amazon Stock Ahead of Q4 Earnings on Possible 2020 Surge?

data.text: Amazon.com Inc.’s longstanding antitrust issues could take center stage ahead of the presidential election, say Monness Crespi Hardt analysts.

data.title: MacKenzie Bezos, Amazon CEO’s ex-wife, sells $400M in stock after pledge to give away billions
data.text: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife, MacKenzie Bezos, has sold off about $400 million worth of the Amazon stock she received as part of the couple’s divorce settlement — potentially providing the wherewithal for the charitable activities she’s planning.

data.title: Amazon Stock Nears Buy Point With Quarterly Earnings On The Way
data.text:
Amazon stock recently formed a new stock-trading pattern that could move it into a buy range as the e-commerce giant reports quarterly earnings on Thursday, after the markets close.

data.title: Amazon and Deliveroo hit back over CMA probe

data.title: Amazon Employees Publicly Condemn Company's Communications, Climate Policies
data.text: More than 350 employees at Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) issued public statements about the company violating its communications policy on Sunday in a show of solidarity with their colleagues who were threatened with termination for doing the very same thing.
